Blog.post: WeLL today wasnt that bad of a day... went to school came home talked to tony for lil bit then showered and tony came over then tridge came over.. StiLL! on house arresst.. hopefully this shyt will all be over though well.. im tired i was up late last nite im going to SLeEp NiTe NiTe ;)

WeLL another day of bein grounded has passed by..mys sister picked me up at 130 and then she took me to the BEST place ever PePeZ! havnt been there in awhile..after PePez i came home and fell asleep like always LiL tOnY called and woke me up..then the rest of the nite i watched 2hours of cops. its been a LoOoOonG bOrInG! day and im not in the best mood..i just wana GO OUT! and hang out w/ my frieds!! AHhHhHhHhHhH GOD!

WeLL today was another LoNg day..it started out terriable too...me and tridge almost getting caught smoking a square by the cops not good for me...and then today at lunch me and vanessa got in a huge argument w/ this stupid sophmore that thinks she is better then every1 and beating up a poor lil freshman for no reason and thinks she is cool w/ her phat farm hightops haha and no sophmore should talk back to juniors haha rite ness? but we ended up beinging good gurlz cuz we arn't guna get in nemore trouble..well then after school i came home and fell asleep rite away i was really tired buuuut leave it up to ToNy to call me and wake my ass up.. its ok though i still luv ya ha ;) then i watched my fav show american idol and i was very mad that latoya london got voted out! it shoulda been jasmine! she wasnt even in the bottom 2!! oh well now i'm guna go lay down cuz im still very tired.

ok this is my first entry, im only doing this cuz im really really bored and grounded. i've been grounded for 20days now... and only 10 more to go...i'm grounded for sumptin stupid that i didn't even do..but it hasnt been that bad Tony always cums over and visits me brings me watever i need...and tridge cumz visits me too..i got to go out last wkend though fun times after prom at the motel w/ the crazy crackhead next door haha and fun times at great america!! Today was a boring day i came home from school slept then tony's ass called and woke me up.. but then i went back to sleep after awhile talking then woke up for american idol everyone vote for fantasia! ScHoOLs aLmost out.. i'm soo excited for SuMmEr!! WeLL i'm having a crazy would you rather convo w/ tridge rite now sooo i gota get back to that....
